page.description: Test if a table is open - return .T. if table is currently open.

argument.name: Tablename
argument.description: The name of the table that you want to test. The .DBF extension is assumed.

page.discussion: The TABLE.ISOPEN() method returns .T. if Table name is open in the current session. Note : The TABLE.IN_USE() method will allow you to test is the table is in use in the current session, or any other session.

section.description: This script checks if the Customer table is open.
